'''[[Delusional Ideas SD-124|Delusional Ideas]] :'''' Alterations in the content of thought leading to a loss of contact with reality, not shared by the socio-cultural group.

'''[[Hallucinations SD-122|Hallucinations]]:''' Sensory perception without the presence of a detectable object.

properties.question: What are delusions and hallucinations as defined in the context of Agitation and acute delirium?
properties.option_b: Alterations in thought leading to a loss of contact with reality
properties.option_c: Physical symptoms experienced during acute illness
properties.option_d: Behavioral changes due to environmental factors
